name: uzssre2

-| wss(cfv(cuz, c1), cr)

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cuz, c1), cr)
-| wss(cfv(cuz, c1), cz)
-| wss(cz, cr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, cr)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c1))

|- wss(c0, cr)

comment: An upper set of integers is a subset of the Reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
